elements.text: You got the flu shot this season to protect yourself and others from the flu. Your boss, on the other hand, has been telling you about the parties they've frequently attended during this flu season despite not being vaccinated. You want to encourage them to get the flu shot, but you think it will start a...

elements.name: Risky Behavior_Social Situations_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
